tool_description: it is test api for rapid
name: my-first-climate-api
title: my-first-climate-api

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Gets News about Climate Change from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://my-first-climate-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "my-first-climate-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://my-first-climate-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "my-first-climate-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Climate Change from all over the world
